title: Docusaurus Chapter Front Matter Schema
description: YAML front matter validation schema for Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics textbook chapters

id.description: Unique chapter identifier matching file path without .md extension

title.description: Full chapter title displayed as H1 heading
examples: ROS 2 Basics: Architecture, Nodes, and Communication

sidebar_label.description: Abbreviated title for sidebar navigation (optional, defaults to title)

sidebar_position.description: Sequential position in course navigation (1=first chapter, 12=last chapter)

description.description: One-sentence chapter summary for SEO meta description
examples: Learn ROS 2 architecture fundamentals including nodes, topics, services, and the publish-subscribe pattern for robot communication.

keywords.description: Technical terms for search indexing and SEO

prerequisites.description: Prior knowledge or chapters required before starting this chapter

items.description: Each objective must start with an action verb and describe a measurable outcome

learning_objectives.description: Measurable learning outcomes students will achieve (SMART format: Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, Time-bound)
examples: Explain ROS 2 architecture and DDS middleware
Create and run ROS 2 nodes using rclpy
Configure Gazebo worlds with custom physics parameters
Integrate LiDAR and camera sensors in simulation
Analyze sensor data from simulated robots

estimated_time.description: Expected completion time for chapter (reading + hands-on examples)

$comment: This schema validates YAML front matter for Docusaurus documentation. Use with YAML linters that support JSON Schema validation.
